title: The Killing League
description: YOU WIN. OR YOU DIE. Wallace Mack is a retired FBI profiler. When he is contacted by an old friend whose daughter is missing, he agrees to try to find her. Soon, he uncovers THE KILLING LEAGUE, a competition among active serial killers. Even worse, Mack soon learns that he, and a woman whose life he helped save, are the grand prize. SOON TO BE A MAJOR MOTION PICTURE "A wild ride. -Amazon.com "Reads like early James Patterson." -Amazon.com "Ames is a sensation among readers who love fast-paced thrillers." -MysteryTribune
author: Dani Amore
